metadata.name: Remote File Download Via Desktopimgdownldr Utility
metadata.comment: Detects the desktopimgdownldr utility being used to download a remote file. An adversary may use desktopimgdownldr to download arbitrary files as an alternative to certutil.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\desktopimgdownldr.exe')) AND endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\desktopimgdownldr.exe')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('/lockscreenurl:http')))

output.summary: Detects the desktopimgdownldr utility being used to download a remote file. An adversary may use desktopimgdownldr to download arbitrary files as an alternative to certutil.
